metadata.title: CVE-2024-53129 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/rockchip: vop: Fix a dereferenced before check warningThe 'state' can't be NULL, we should check crtc_state.Fix warning:drivers/gpu/drm/rockchip/rockchip_drm_vop.c:1096vop_plane_atomic_async_check() warn: variable dereferenced before check'state' (see line 1077)

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
